column4: hello all. i just installed ubuntu 9.04 yesterday and im having an issue with some in browser streaming video players with firefox. myspace player looks like a jumble of symbols and blip.tv goes to black screen with the loading symbol but it never loads. anyone have any advice?
it  might be that you have a couple different plugins trying to play the file, do you have vlc installed? I think they have an flv plugin
go to preferences > applications. what does it say for playing flash video?
